some COPS Office–funded activities include fees collected
for conference registration, exhibit booths, and website
advertisements. Interest earned on advances of federal funds
is not program income. Except as otherwise provided for
in federal statutes, regulations, or the award terms and
conditions, program income does not include rebates,
credits, discounts, and interest earned on any of them. Program income must be used in accordance with the
standards set forth in 2 C.F.R. § 200.307. Program income

from a federal award unless expressly authorized, in writing,
by the COPS Office. 2 How do I know if my COPS Office award
generates program income? Although recipients are encouraged to earn program income
to defray program costs where appropriate, most COPS
Office awards are not conducive to generating program
income. Contact your COPS Office program manager or
